42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: ‘Ammar b. Yasir said:I came to my family when my hands had cracks. They dyed me with saffron. I then went to Prophet (ﷺ) and saluted him, but he did not return me salutation. He said: Go and wash it away from you

chapter.ara-name: باب تَرْكِ السَّلاَمِ عَلَى أَهْلِ الأَهْوَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Abandonment Of Saluting The Heretics
